channel.title: Using git :: CIS 308 Textbook
channel.description: This class will use GitHub links to create initial repositories for both labs and programming projects, similarly to what you have done in CIS 300 and 301. GitHub account First, you will need to create a GitHub account here. If you already have one, you can use your existing account. Verify a git install You will likely already have a command-line version of git installed on your machine. To check, open a folder in VS Code, display the integrated terminal, and type:
